global

Class SpriteLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • global.SpriteLoader

  • public class SpriteLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to load a sprite from a file.
    Author:
    quentin sauvage

    • Method Summary

      Loads a sprite from a file.

      • getInstance

        public static SpriteLoader getInstance()
        Getter for the instance of SpriteLoader.
        Returns:
        the single instance of SpriteLoader.

      • getFirstPlayerIndex

        public int getFirstPlayerIndex()
        Getter for the firstPlayerIndex in the sprites list.
        Returns:
        the index of the first player sprite in the sprites list.

      • getFirstBombIndex

        public int getFirstBombIndex()
        Getter for the firstBombIndex in the sprites list.
        Returns:
        the index of the first bombsprite in the sprites list.

      • loadSprites

        public void loadSprites(java.util.List<GameSprite> list,
                        boolean sprite)
        Loads and adds the sprites in the list, regarding their type (object or background).
        Parameters:
        list - the list in which will be added the sprites.
        sprite - boolean refering to whether or not it should add the objects sprites.
        See Also:
        GameSprite

      • load

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage load(java.lang.String path,
                                         boolean sprite)
        Loads a sprite from a file.
        Parameters:
        path - the sprite path
        sprite - indicates if the sprite is in the sprite directory.
        Returns:
        a BufferedImage corresponding to the loaded sprite.
